backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing order creation, retrieval, payment confirmation updates, and status timeline tracking using an in-memory Map.
feature_evidence.json: Report describing three AdSense-related features with associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files detailing their purpose, behavior, and interactions within the app.
frontend/android/.gitkeep: Placeholder file marking the directory for generated Android platform code.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor configuration defining app ID, name, web directory, server settings, and Android build options.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles with theme variables, dark mode tokens, and component styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document setting metadata, icons, manifest, and loading the main React entrypoint.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and startup configuration.
frontend/README-android-apk.md: Instructions for building the Android APK using Capacitor and Android Studio.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that conditionally renders customer UI with ads or admin dashboard, manages navigation, ordering, WhatsApp actions, and APK download checks.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminApkDo: Admin APK download button that checks availability before initiating the download.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Admin dashboard displaying order stats, filters, order list, details, and logout and APK download actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Admin login modal validating a 4‑digit PIN before granting dashboard access.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderDetai: Shows detailed order info in a sheet and allows admins to update order status.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrdersFilt: Provides payment and status dropdown filters for the admin orders list.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrdersTabl: Renders a table of orders with status, payment info, and a view-details action.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdsHeadInjec: Injects the ad provider’s head script once when ads are enabled.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdSlot.tsx: Mounts a runtime-configured ad snippet into a container when ads are enabled.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdsSettingsP: UI panel for owners to edit and save local AdSense settings with validation.
frontend/src/components/OrderForm.tsx: UI form for selecting plate type and quantity, validates minimum order, and submits orders via useCreateOrder.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPhoto.tsx: Renders owner profile photo with fallback image handling and size presets.
frontend/src/components/PostOrderConfirm: Payment confirmation modal handling UPI actions, WhatsApp links, form submission, and fallback flows.
frontend/src/components/PromoPopup.tsx: Timed promo popup encouraging ordering, dismissible and session-persistent.
frontend/src/components/SimpleModal.tsx: Generic modal showing a message with optional WhatsApp link and copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/config/ads.ts: Defines ads config structure and helpers to generate AdSense head and slot snippets.
frontend/src/config/apk.ts: Provides APK metadata for customer and admin apps, including URLs and labels.
frontend/src/config/payment.ts: Exports business payment settings such as UPI ID, delivery charge, and business name.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependents on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuthorization: Tracks admin authorization state based on URL hash and token changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminOrders.ts: Fetches all admin-accessible orders when authorization and actor are valid.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdsConfig.ts: React hook that merges admin mode, environment detection, and stored ad settings to produce a runtime ads configuration with dynamic AdSense snippets.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateOrder.ts: Provides a React Query mutation to create orders via the backend actor and invalidates the orders cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth state, including login, logout, and restoring identities from storage.
React Query mutation for updating an order’s status through the backend and refreshing admin order data.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdatePaymentConfi: Mutation hook to update payment confirmation details for an order and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining color variables, dark mode themes, animations, and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/adminAccess.ts: Utility functions for validating, setting, and clearing admin access tokens stored in the URL hash.
frontend/src/lib/ads.ts: Helpers to safely inject provider scripts and mount or unmount ad slot snippets in the DOM.
frontend/src/lib/adsOwnerSettings.ts: Manages AdSense owner settings in localStorage with validation and change event notifications.
frontend/src/lib/apkAvailability.ts: Utilities for checking availability, downloading, and returning messages for customer and admin APK files.
frontend/src/lib/orderRules.ts: Defines minimum order rules and provides helper messages for enforcing plate quantity requirements.
frontend/src/lib/runtimeEnvironment.ts: Runtime checks to detect whether the app is running in a Capacitor environment or a standard web browser.
frontend/src/lib/upi.ts: Provides utilities to build UPI deep links, open specific UPI apps like Paytm or Google Pay, and copy UPI links to the clipboard.
frontend/src/lib/vpaValidation.ts: Validates UPI VPAs by checking format and rejecting placeholder patterns, and returns a user-friendly error message for invalid cases.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Generates WhatsApp deep links for order messages, payment confirmations, and screenshot requests, with helpers to open them in a new window.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, themes, plugins, animations, and content paths.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, existing features, and pending requests related to integrating Google AdSense.
